James Cryer

Web and Mobile Developer

A highly skilled developer with a passion for the web. Working with agencies and start ups to produce awesome sites and applications.

Approaches

Web

Over 8 years commercial software development for the web. Developing web apps using the technologies such as PHP, Ruby, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Scala and NodeJS.

CMS

Using open source CMS's, such as WordPress, to turn rapidly transform ideas into solutions. Using mature platforms, backed by strong communities, to dramatically reduce costs and time.

Mobile

Development of native applications for iPhone, iPad and Android devices. Use of Objective-C and Java ensure you're position to exploit the latest developments in both iOS and Android platforms.

The process

Definition

At the early stages, product visioning and definition is carried out collobaratively to ensure projects deliver results.

Development

My development metholodgy follows agile development practises following the principles of Test Driven Development (TDD) with Behaviour Driven Development (BDD). Features are delivered iteratively ensure early returns on investment.

Delivery

An ethos of delivering quality features. Once live, a close working relationship is maintained and enhance products to ensure products continue to deliver returns.
